TopicTitle: Campaign Save will not Load - Stuck at "Creating Vessel"

Articles.Content:
Computer Specifications:

CPU: Intel i9-13900K
GPU: Nvidia RTX 3070 (EVGA)
RAM: 32GB DDR5 4400MHz
Storage: 2TB Nvme - Samsung Pro 980

Current Nvidia Driver 546.17
Windows 11 Pro 22H2

Player.log file - Google Drive Link
.ZIP of Save folder - Google Drive Link

Issue:

About 4 hours into a campaign, I had docked a third piece to a space station I was working on. I saved and then quit for the night. Upon returning I couldn't load that save, or any save in the last 30 minutes tht included the ship most recently used.

I would click the load button, then the most recent save (or save with said ship), it would show the loading splash screen, make it to "Creating Vessel" and then never progress.

Attempts to Fix:

I followed the guide for posting here and verified steam integrity, as well as getting the player log and zip of save folder. I then deleted the save folder and ran the game (it worked of course), then re-added the save to see if the problem persisted and it did.

Idea:

I'm guessing the ship file became courrupted or something similar to that. I double I'm the first person with this problem but can't find another post using the search so I thought it would be a good idea to post this information.
